title: MRI Reconstruction with Regularized 3D Diffusion Model (R3DM)
details: A Bangun, Z Cao, A Quercia, H Scharr, E Pfaehler - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.18723, 2024
abstract: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) is a powerful imaging technique widely used for visualizing structures within the human body and in other fields such as plant sciences. However, there is a demand to develop fast 3D-MRI reconstruction …
